comment: Easy A. There are barely any graded assignments since there is no homework. Lecture notes posted online and the practice quizzes/tests provided are exactly like the real exams. She does not accept ANY late grades so everything must be done within the deadline.

She truly cares about her students, she gives every resource for them to pass with flying colors, it's hard not to get an A in her class. Very caring and enthusiastic, she'll greet you with a smile. A professor who's passionate about what she teaches, will get you interested in the subject too, atleast i did.
This was the easiest class I have ever taken. Only weekly quizzes with no lockdown browser. This literally is a free class.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things--Online Savvy

comment: TAKE HER !!!!!!!!!!

Easiest class I've taken in a long time. Everything is open book/open note with NO LOCKDOWN BROWSER. I was dreading this Economics class but I actually ended up learning something so I'd call it a win. Great professor, take her!

Great and funny professor! Outright provides study guides to students and allows you to 
"use your resources" for each and every quiz, including finals. Very student-friendly and you won't really spend much time on this course, but you will still preform well.

TAKE HER!!! Attendance isn't mandatory but the lectures are engaging and the professor is friendly. Tests won't be reopened once closed, no exceptions. If you keep up with deadlines, you'll easily pass. I scored 105 without much effort. The quizzes and exams carry weight, but they're easy. Practice exams are almost the same as the real thing.
The textbook is no necessary for ECON 1000. Be careful with every grade as there are only 6 quizzes and tests that make up your entire grade. Quizzes and tests are extremely easy.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: an easy A! no homework and only 4 quizzes and the midterm and final. took this as a 10-week period and never struggled. make sure you don't miss any of the quizzes or tests though, as she doesn't reopen any of them for any reason. attendance is not required, but she will sometimes give extra credit to those in class after a quiz!

AMAZING professor, take her if you can. 1 ten question quiz each week with a midterm and final each about 30ish questions, all not lockdown. SUPER easy class, just do the work. She is super nice and responds quick. 2 short essay question assignments towards the end, but extremely easy grader. TAKE HER!
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: The professor was great! She sent regular reminders and helpful resources to succeed in the class. She made economics applicable and fun.
Ms.Kelani Zaynep is the best teacher at KSU!!!

TOO MUCH in TOO LITTLE TIME! I had to read THREE 50+ page chapters in one week and take a quiz over material TWICE! This is not a realistic class. Didn't learn a thing to be honest. Glad the exams are just the study guides. This class needs to be a whole 5 month semester so students can actually learn! Teacher was also pretty rude and conceited.

I was surprised by the good reviews! I thought she was going to be great. Unfortunately, this teacher has a *superiority complex*. I read one chapter 2 days prior to it being released and emailed her a question I had. She immediately scolded me, stating the chapter wasn't open. Who cares? I'm doing work proactively. Get off your high horse!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Graded by few things--Test heavy

comment: Professor Kelani was an amazing professor. She really cares if you understand the material. If you don't understand a concept after the lecture or after she reviews it in class, you can email her and she will send you additional help. She structures her class by lecturing the chapters, reviewing the chapters, and then a final review before the test
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Easy A. Take this class during a semester you know you'll have to take with several hard classes. The only downside is that I was unmotivated to learn anything in the class or even attend class except on test days.
Really great and caring professor. Her grade is made up of 4 tests that are very easy if you go to class. The book is not necessary but helpful for people looking for more information
rating_tags: Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: This was an easy A. If you don't get an A, you didn't try, period. The study guides were the tests. Literally just do the study guide and so up for test days - the bare minimum- and you will be fine.

Awesome professor! Really cares about students and how they learn! Doesnt give homework or quizzes and there is no final ! You have four test so pass every single one and do the study guides . Show up to the class before a test and basically get all you need to pass!!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: This class was simple, there were four test that made your grade. The notes were provided online, and if you study the notes briefly you'll do well. You also want to show up the class before the test because she does not give out answers to the study guide online. no surprises on the test, it is similar to the study guide
rating_tags: TEST HEAVY--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Awesome Professor! She is hilarious and makes it very easy for the students to understand. Not to mention, her exams are almost the exact same as the study guides that she provides.

Professor Kelani is AMAZING! I was so worried about taking econ bc I was bad at it in HS but she TRULY wants you to understand the content. She reviews before each test and will learn your name really quickly if you sit in the front and participate which is a benefit because she's incredibly nice! Please take her class!!! Shes the best Econ prof!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--TEST HEAVY

comment: She gives you a review for all 4 tests, and if you show up the class before each test, she gives out the answers. Show up for the answers, look over the review and it's an easy A.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Clear grading criteria--TEST HEAVY

comment: 4 Tests all semester, if you bomb one kiss goodbye to your A. Overall of you study you'll pass.

Professor Kelani was one of the best professors I ever had. She has so much enthusiasm that it makes class entertaining. Some people don't like her accent, but I think it makes her unique. Suggestion: bring printed lecture notes to class and get there 5 minutes early. I know she doesn't take attendance, but to every single class! It's worth it!
Wonderful professor that puts her heart into all her teachings! She loves class participation, so be attentive. Explains concepts really well. Attend class, her company is actually enjoyable

Language barrier, but you don't have to show up to class to get and A or B in the class. She posts study guides that are verbatim what the tests will be like. I would def. recommend her for an easy passing grade.

Prof. Kelani has a strong accent, so it is difficult to understand her half of the time. I ended up never going to class after week 2, but attendance isnt mandatory! ONLY GO TO THE REVIEW DAY CLASSES because she gives you answers! Thankfully her tests are very close to her notes and study guides, so i just taught myself and made a B doing so.

Easy A.,4 exams, nothing else, no extra credit. You don't need to buy the book (she's going to tell you to buy it, don't do it). Make sure you attend test review days, study her notes, and complete chapter reviews (VERY SIMILAR TO TEST) Professor Kelani is so funny and extremely passionate about Economics, you'll enjoy her class!

I really enjoyed my time in her class, but my only critique would be that her accent is kinda hard to understand at times. She givens study guides online and be sure to use them because they will help you on the test a lot.
Clear bojectijes and good lectures.  Even without attending class of buying a book you can pas easily.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Class consists of 4 tests. Her tests are almost identical to the study guides. She's a pretty good teacher. Would take again.

Professor Kelani is an amazing professor. Her class was very easy in that her study guides actually prepares you for her tests. Add that to the fact that the lectures, while somewhat optional, are very fun to attend. She takes pride in her job as well, and makes it her every effort to teach her students what they need to know need the curriculum.

Very nice teacher. She tends miss at least 1/2 of the class which will help you. Hard tests but will give better grade if you promise to do better. Got C's and D's on tests made A in class. Recomend highly.
Excellent teacher!!!!!!!!!!!!
She gives study guides for the chapter she goes over. They are NOT too hard, but she goes through them in class anyways. Take her if looking for an easy class. tests are easy

Extremely easy. She gives you study guides, you don't even have to do them. The study guide questions are the test questions. Only annoying thing is the homework, which is at the end of every chapter. Other than those, no other work is done in class.
